titleStmt.title: A setting open of the subtyle sophistrie of Thomas VVatson Doctor of Diuinitie which he vsed in hys two sermons made before Queene Mary, in the thirde and fift Fridayes in Lent anno. 1553. to prooue the reall presence of Christs body and bloud in the sacrament, and the Masse to be the sacrifice of the newe Testament, written by Robert Crowley clearke. Seene and allowed according to the Queenes Maiesties iniunctions.
titleStmt.author: Crowley, Robert, 1518?-1588.

titleStmt.title: A setting open of the subtyle sophistrie of Thomas VVatson Doctor of Diuinitie which he vsed in hys two sermons made before Queene Mary, in the thirde and fift Fridayes in Lent anno. 1553. to prooue the reall presence of Christs body and bloud in the sacrament, and the Masse to be the sacrifice of the newe Testament, written by Robert Crowley clearke. Seene and allowed according to the Queenes Maiesties iniunctions.
titleStmt.author: Crowley, Robert, 1518?-1588.
Watson, Thomas, 1513-1584. Twoo notable sermons.

notesStmt.note: Reprints and replies to: Watson, Thomas. Twoo notable sermons.
The second sermon begins new pagination; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
